Let $X_1,\dots,X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}f$. The kernal

$$
\hat{f}(x)=\frac{1}{n}\sum^{n}_{i=1}K_h(x-X_i)
$$


```{r}
## Minimal example of a Monte Carlo
set.seed(1)
n <- 100
R <- 1000
xbar <- numeric()
for(r in 1:R){
  xbar[r] <- mean(rnorm(n, 10, 1))
}
```

```{r}
hist(xbar)
```
